text: Lester Ryan (18 April 1959 â€“ 6 June 2020) was an Irish sportsman. He was born in County Kilkenny. He played hurling with his local club Clara and with the Kilkenny intercounty team. Ryan won two All-Ireland Minor Hurling medals, three Leinster Senior Hurling medals and appeared in two All-Ireland finals. Ryan was killed in a bike crash on 6 June 2020 in Gowran, Ireland at the age of 61. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Irish sportspeople Category:Road accident deaths Category:Hurling
title: Lester Ryan
